hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: flush_passphrase
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description:
Please input flush_passphrase correctly, after enabled whether_flushdatabaseonconnect.
This would avoid people occasionally flush DB by mistake.
The default value is FLUSH_DB

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: chef_json
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
{ "common_basic": { # service hosts: deploy service to which host "couchbase_hosts":["kitchen-cluster-node1", "kitchen-cluster-node2"], "elasticsearch_hosts":["kitchen-cluster-node1", "kitchen-cluster-node2"], "elasticsearch_audit_hosts":[], "mdm_hosts":["kitchen-cluster-node2"], "mdmbackup_hosts":["kitchen-cluster-node3"], "haproxy_hosts":["kitchen-cluster-node1","kitchen-cluster-node2"], "nagios_server":"kitchen-cluster-node3",
# specify branch name "app_branch_name":"$app_branch_name", "framework_branch_name":"$framework_branch_name", "devops_branch_name":"$devops_branch_name",
"package_url":"http://repo.carol.ai:18000",
# tcp ports "haproxy_port":"80", "haproxy_ssl_port":"443", "app_http_port":"8080", "app_https_port":"8443" }, "nagios3": { "memory_warn_threshold":"85" }, "nagios_mdm": { "elasticsearch_warn_mem_mb":"6144", "elasticsearch_cri_mem_mb":"7168", "elasticsearch_warn_mem_cpu":"250", "elasticsearch_cri_mem_cpu":"350", "es_min_replica_count":"2", "es_min_shard_count":"5", "couchbase_warn_mem_mb":"6144", "couchbase_cri_mem_mb":"7168", "mdm_warn_mem_mb":"6144", "mdm_cri_mem_mb":"7168", "mdm_warn_cpu":"200", "mdm_cri_cpu":"400", "slack_cri_channel":"carol-alerts", "slack_all_channel":"carol-alerts", # TODO: use correct slack token "slack_token":""}, "couchbase_mdm": {"memory_quota_mb":"2048"}, "elasticsearch_mdm": {"allocated_memory_mb":"2048", "audit_allocated_memory_mb":"1024", "elasticsearch_clustername":"$elasticsearch_clustername", "elasticsearch_audit_clustername":"${elasticsearch_clustername}_audit", "elasticsearch_path_data":"/usr/share/elasticsearch,/data/elasticsearch" }, "app_mdm": {"skip_mdm_yml_update":"false", "skip_update_jar":"false", "whether_run_mdm_healthcheck:"false", "max_simultaneous_threads":"8", "max_total_threads":"64", # By default we add all plugins, excluding the ones are specified "plugin_exclude_list_regexp":"mdm-bematech-plugin-.*.jar", "cb_bucket_retries":"10", "cb_bucket_retryinterval":"10000", "cb_bucket_timeout":"100000", "cb_replicas_count":"0", "ensure_app_start":"false", "elasticsearch_replicas_count":"0", "elasticsearch_shards_count":"1", "elasticsearch_audit_replicas_count":"0", "elasticsearch_audit_shards_count":"1", "enable_slack_sync":"true", "slack_user":"Critical Server", # TODO: change to correct log_slack_token in real deployment "log_slack_token":"", "log_slack_channel":"mdm-local-logs", "session_bucket_quota_in_mb":"100", "staging_bucket_quota_in_mb":"512", "master_bucket_quota_in_mb":"640", "mgmt_timeout":"900000", "max_timeout":"960000", "mdm_java_opts":"-Xms1g -Xmx2g -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=2g", "mincomputationpoolsize":"16", "whether_flushdatabaseonconnect":"$whether_flushdatabaseonconnect", "whether_populatefakedata":"false", "whether_populaterealdata":"false", "whether_populategenerateddata":"false", # AI # TODO: change to right host "ai_product_normalization_host_backupStagingData":"", "ai_product_normalization_rpath":"/r/productNormalization", # backup "backupConfig_backupStagingData":"true", "backupConfig_redoLog":"false", # Customize the host to fit your env "logback_remotehost":"kitchen-cluster-node3", # pass to mdm.yml "backupConfig_backupServerUrl":"https://kitchen-cluster-node3:8084/backup/api/v1/plugins/backupServer/", # pass to backupserver.yml "backupConfig_mdmUrl":"https://kitchen-cluster-node2:8443/api/v1/" } }
